tool.name: Reference Encoding
tool.description: Encode query mask to match reference mask. See Alicia Lee.

param.name: path_to_ref_masks
param.label: Enter path to reference masks whose encoding will be applied to reference masks. Example: CellMasks

param.name: path_to_query_masks
param.label: Enter path to query masks that will receive encoding from reference. Example: CellMasks

tool.help: Generates encoding for reference and query masks.
